com.lonnyjacobson.webapp_minifier.options
Interface PluginOptions

All Superinterfaces:
OverridablePluginOptions
All Known Implementing Classes:
WebappMinifierMojo
public interface PluginOptions
extends OverridablePluginOptions

This class packages the options for the plugin such that they can be easily shared between classes.

Author:
Lonny
